Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Prohibits any person who owns or manages more than four rental units within the state from serving as a public member on a rent guidelines board
Summary: Prohibits any person who owns or manages more than four rental units within the state from serving as a public member on a rent guidelines board.
LawCode: Amd ยง4, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, in relation to qualifications of public members of rent guidelines boards
